name: Scrap Pilot
description:
Note, parts can be rotated with [R].

This is my entry to the Ludum Dare 49 game jam.

Theme: Unstable

You are a delivery pilot living above the clouds tasked with delivering cargo to other residents of the sky. Use scrap and parts to build and design you own aircraft to make the deliveries.

Place frames and thrusters to make an aircraft, choose what key to control each thruster and of you go.

Tools used:

  • Unity 3D
  • Audacity
  • Gimp
  • Blender
